    • Uses of ScheduledTask in com.dotmarketing.quartz

      Subclasses of ScheduledTask in com.dotmarketing.quartz 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CronScheduledTask 
      class  SimpleScheduledTask 
      Methods in com.dotmarketing.quartz that return types with arguments of type ScheduledTask 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<ScheduledTask> QuartzUtils.getScheduledTask(java.lang.String jobName, java.lang.String jobGroup)
      This methods checks all jobs configured either in the standard or the sequential schedulers that match the given jobName and jobGroup Even if the job is only configured in a single scheduler this method could return a list with multiple instances because the same job could be configured with multiple triggers.
      static java.util.List<ScheduledTask> QuartzUtils.getScheduledTasks()
      Lists all jobs scheduled through the standard scheduler, the standard scheduler let you run multiple jobs in parallel
      static java.util.List<ScheduledTask> QuartzUtils.getScheduledTasks(java.lang.String group)
      Lists all jobs scheduled through the standard scheduler that belong to the given group
      static java.util.List<ScheduledTask> QuartzUtils.getSequentialScheduledTask(java.lang.String jobName, java.lang.String jobGroup)
      This methods checks all jobs configured either in the sequential scheduler that match the given jobName and jobGroup This method could return a list with multiple instances because the same job could be configured with multiple triggers.
      static java.util.List<ScheduledTask> QuartzUtils.getSequentialScheduledTasks()
      Lists all jobs scheduled through the sequential scheduler, the sequential scheduler let you run only one job at a time
      static java.util.List<ScheduledTask> QuartzUtils.getSequentialScheduledTasks(java.lang.String group)
      Lists all jobs scheduled through the sequential scheduler that belong to the given group
      static java.util.List<ScheduledTask> QuartzUtils.getStandardScheduledTask(java.lang.String jobName, java.lang.String jobGroup)
      This methods checks all jobs configured either in the standard scheduler that match the given jobName and jobGroup This method could return a list with multiple instances because the same job could be configured with multiple triggers.
      static java.util.List<ScheduledTask> QuartzUtils.getStandardScheduledTasks()
      Lists all jobs scheduled through the standard scheduler, the standard scheduler let you run multiple jobs in parallel
      static java.util.List<ScheduledTask> QuartzUtils.getStandardScheduledTasks(java.lang.String group)
      Lists all jobs scheduled through the standard scheduler that belong to the given group
      Methods in com.dotmarketing.quartz with parameters of type ScheduledTask 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void QuartzUtils.scheduleTask(ScheduledTask job)
      This methods schedules the given job in the quartz system, and depending on the sequentialScheduled property it will use the sequential of the standard scheduler
